scripts.db:console: docker compose run postgres psql -h postgres -U postgres -d mad_mini_backend
scripts.docker:db:migrate: docker compose run backend pnpx db:migrate
scripts.docker:db:migrate:undo: docker compose run backend npx prisma migrate reset --preview-feature
scripts.docker:seed:dev: docker compose run backend pnpm ts-node scripts/seeds/dev.ts
scripts.rebuild:be: docker compose build backend && docker compose rm --force --stop backend && docker compose up -d backend
scripts.watch: watchy --no-init-spawn --debounce 1 -w src -- docker compose restart backend
